Gordon Enterprises LLC

App Development Services

Have an app idea for your new or existing business, but don't have the technical know-how or resources to create it in-house? We have the answer.

Whether you are targetting ios, android or progressive web apps (PWA's), our fullstack team excels at creating custom solutions to fit your needs.

some of the technologies we use

Cross-Platform

Whether targetting Apple ios, Google Android, Microsoft or blackberry phones, or even desktop applications, we can handle it all. We offer ios/android native apps developed with a single code base (React Native), as well as hybrid-mobile apps contained in a web view to cover any platform and any screen size with one language.

Targeting

With

  • Iphone
  • Android
  • Mobile
  • Desktop
  • Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)
  • Hybrid-Native Apps
  • Native Apps
  • Single Page Applications (SPAs)

Latest Tech

We are constantly evolving our processes and changing our development tools as technology matures and improves. With the number of projects we have deployed, we are well versed in picking the right tools to get the job done.

Current Stack

  • React Native
  • Node.js
  • Express
  • MongoDB
  • Mongoose
  • Yarn
  • Webpack
  • Github
  • Watchman

Technology Consulting

Already have or are you creating a team of developers to create your application idea and just need some guidance figuring out what tech stack would be best suited for your needs? We offer full fledged consulting services helping identify scope, required dependencies, and setting you up with version control amongst other services.

Guidance With

  • Frontend
  • Backend
  • Databases
  • Hosting
  • Version Control
  • Build Tool Selection

Appstore Submission

In addition to creating your native, hybrid or progressive app we provide appstore submission services. Whether the Appstore, Playstore, Amazon, Ubuntu, iTunes or otherwise, we will walk you through the process and obtain the things you need to get your app in production as soon as possible.

Guidance With

  • Frontend
  • Backend
  • Databases
  • Hosting
  • Version Control
  • Build Tool Selection

Web Development
